attributes.action: If British Government fails to spend £350m/wk EXTRA, punish Brexit team
attributes.additional_details:
The Brexit campaign team must deliver their promise as written on their bus, it is morally unacceptable for a statement leading to such a seismic change in Britain’s status not to be delivered.
There must be no “ifs”, no “buts” it must be prison until the money they promised is being spent on the British people.
attributes.background: The politicians on the Brexit bus promised that the British government would spend £350 million EXTRA per week on the British, if they don’t within 2 years of invoking “Article 50 they must go to prison
